subject: Marathon Running
Chicago Marathon
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: A flat course could give Sammy Wanjiru, the gold medalist from Beijing, a chance to break the mark Haile Gebrselassie set last fall in Berlin.
snippet: A flat course could give Sammy Wanjiru, the gold medalist from Beijing, a chance to break the mark Haile Gebrselassie set last fall in Berlin.
